snippet.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl — The Time of Opportunities Trailer - Xbox Games Showcase 2024
snippet.description:
The Zone is what you consider it to be. I've shown you how I see it. Walk your own path, and you will come to perceive the Zone in your own way. 

Featuring a huge, borderless open-world and a non-linear story, S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl releases on Xbox Series X|S and PC on September 5, 2024. The game will be available day one with Xbox Game Pass.

Music tracks used:
“Krai" by Mykola Mozghovyi
"Energetyk" by DK Energetyk
"Khryzantemy" by Anastymoza

SUBSCRIBE TO XBOX: https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR
